attributes.action: New lockdown need to be protected self-employed because they also have a family
attributes.additional_details: I am very concerned about this situation because I am also a rider and it is very difficult at this time I would like a government to help me when we can help
attributes.background: Riders work a day so if you return to a new lockdown the many people won't be there to arrive at the end of the month

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the safety of self-employed workers, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could request the Government increase grants for self-employed workers affected by Covid-19.
